subject: CHIC
name: Latinos in the United States
fullname: Honors: Latinos in the United States: Culture and Citizenship
info: Historical/cultural knowledge on the complex/multi-layered relationship that Latinos have to the U.S., their country of origin. Influence of social, cultural, and political dynamics on Latino identity, politics, and sense of belonging in the U.S. Cultural citizenship.

subject: CHIC
name: H: Maya-Aztec-Spanish
fullname: Honors: Introduction to Chicana/o Studies: Beginnings to 1875
info: Convergence of Europe, America in Mesoamerica. Formation of Mexican society. Literary, social, cultural, historical perspectives. Pre-Columbian period to 1875.

subject: CHIC
name: H: Chicano Southwest
fullname: Honors: Introduction to Chicana/o Studies: Mexico and the United States From 1871 to Present
info: Convergence of Spanish-Mexican/Anglo-American societies in Spanish borderlands. Formation of contemporary Chicano political, economic, cultural consciousness; forms in which it has been expressed.
